amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the South Carolina HBCU Science and Technology initiative (SC).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 35 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for the South Carolina HBCU Science and Technology Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 70 - 357 (Roll no. 637).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 70 - 357 (Roll no. 637).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
